main event: Civilians observed several silvery-white objects in the sky for approximately 3 hours in November 1957.
interesting points: The sighting involved 9 unidentified objects,The objects were described as silvery-white and following white lights,The observation lasted for 3 hours under clear weather conditions,Conflicting reports were found when checked with the Civil Air Patrol,Conclusions ranged from balloons to possibly aircraft or astronomical phenomena.
sighted object: nine silvery-white objects in the sky
